StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary01_Name
StringTable.String: Boric the Quick

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary01_Dec
StringTable.String: Boric the Quick has made a small fortune searching the galaxy for the lost wonders of the Precursors. Always the first to appear when something valuable has been uncovered, he's also usually the first to make an exit when those treasures prove too dangerous.

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary01_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=CanSurveyIcon] Survey Ship [ICON=Moves_Icon] Fast

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary02_Name
StringTable.String: Adrastos Vanya

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary02_Dec
StringTable.String: Adrastos Vanya is well known for his fearless explorations of unknown worlds. His small, lightly armed ship is excellent at surveying planets, though rather less effective at standing up for itself. Unfortunate, given Adrastos' habit of never running away from a fight.

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary02_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=CanSurveyIcon] Survey Ship [ICON=Shiprange_Icon] Extremely long ship range.

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary03_Name
StringTable.String: Cain Rhuin

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary03_Dec
StringTable.String: Cain Rhuin's charming smile has coaxed many to follow him on his crazy escapades into the unknown. Although his ship is armed, its real strength is its ability to support fleets of shorter range vessels. It's also aptly named, several of his 'escorts' invariably needing to be replaced after every voyage.

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary03_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=CanSurveyIcon] Survey Ship [ICON=Shiprange_Icon] Shares Range with Fleet

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary04_Name
StringTable.String: Mirazu Ysen

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary04_Dec
StringTable.String: Never one to miss a good bargain, Mirazu Ysen always get the biggest bang for his buck when selling anomalies discovered on his survey expeditions. His lightly armed ship is quick and well equipped for surveying.

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary04_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=CanSurveyIcon] Survey Ship [ICON=Stat_Credits_Icon] Earns 25 credits per anomaly Surveyed.

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary05_Name
StringTable.String: LL'anso

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary05_Dec
StringTable.String: LL'anso knows something you don't. For some reason, not a pirate in the galaxy dares approach her or her ship, the Sable. Whether she's an old comrade, ancient enemy, or possesses a potent pirate-slaying weapon, no-one can say. The upshot of all this is that she makes a terrifically effective scout.

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary05_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=ImmuneToNebula] Immune to Nebula Effects [ICON=Stat_Special_Icon] Ignored by Pirates

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary06_Name
StringTable.String: Arratic Ken

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary06_Dec
StringTable.String: The H12-Super is one of the most famous ships in the bars and narcotic dens of the galaxy. Claimed to be the fastest ship in the galaxy by its owner and pilot, Arratic Ken, not everyone agrees with that. Though all agree that he's one of the fastest talkers in the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary06_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Shiprange_Icon] Very Fast [ICON=Shiprange_Icon] Extremely long ship range.

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary07_Name
StringTable.String: Sizzor Thane

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary07_Dec
StringTable.String: Sizzor Thane is a thinker. Scouts, he reasons, need sensors. Lots of them. But scouts always use small ships. Sizzor Thane's great idea was to cram sensor equipment into a cargo hull. Sizzor Thane is proud of this idea.

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary07_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=SensorRange_Icon] Extremely large sensor range

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary08_Name
StringTable.String: Blandon Xute

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary08_Dec
StringTable.String: Blandon Xute comes from a family of 24 siblings, every one of them killed in battle. Desperate to flee the curse that has beset his family, Blandon went into mining instead, outfitting his ship, the Xorbert, with powerful mining modules.

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary08_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Mining_Icon] +100% To resource yields of Mining Starbase ship is stationed at.

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary09_Name
StringTable.String: Pizzota Of Karn

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary09_Dec
StringTable.String: The people of Karn are known for their charm and social graces, and Pizzota is one of the most famous practitioners of their art. His ship, the Fencer, is a welcome sight across the galaxy, and greeted warmly by political and cultural leaders in every port it hails.

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary09_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=InfluenceGrowth_Icon] +100% influence per turn of any Starbase ship is stationed at.

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary10_Name
StringTable.String: Retuio III

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary10_Dec
StringTable.String: Retuio III has struggled her whole life living up to the legacy of her grandmother, the dreaded pirate Retuio, and has tried to forge a new path for herself, by becoming a formidable administrator. She can't escape her blood entirely however, rejecting corporate life for the path of a freelancer.

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary10_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=AreaofEffectIcon] +3 to the Area of Effect of any starbase ship is stationed at.

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary11_Name
StringTable.String: Dr. Angekio Zi

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary11_Dec
StringTable.String: Rumored to be over five thousand years old, Dr. Angekio Zi is either an expert on biological longevity or the spreading of rumors. Now offering his services to aid colonial efforts, his colony ships, the Pollen, have an impressive record when colonizing new worlds.

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary11_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=CanColonizeIcon] Holds more colonist [ICON=Stat_Manufacturing_Icon] +20% Raw Production to any colony founded with this ship.

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary12_Name
StringTable.String: Bin Beebo

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary12_Dec
StringTable.String: A shipwreck survivor turned expert on survivalist techniques, Bin Beebo has visited some of the most hostile worlds in the galaxy and lived to tell the tale. He now sells his services to colonists trying to forge a new life on harsh worlds.

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary12_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=CanColonizeIcon] Can Colonize Aquatic, Frozen and Desert Extreme Worlds

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary15_Name
StringTable.String: Avatar-278

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary15_Dec
StringTable.String: An avatar for the sentient harvesting unit, RG-278, who was forced to flee the world of its creation during a theologically-fuelled purge of artificial intelligences. After wandering the stars for many centuries, RG-278 now quietly seeks to support itself doing the only thing it ever loved.

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary15_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Raw_Productive_Icon] +5 Raw Production to any planet ship is stationed at.

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary16_Name
StringTable.String: T'y't'n'lp

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary16_Dec
StringTable.String: T'y't'n'lp hails from a mysterious, vowel-less race from the outer rim. Provided a ship equipped with powerful fabrication technology, she was sent on a mission to locate a new source of vowels for her people. Now stranded far from home, she sells her vessel's services to help eke out a living.

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary16_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Manufacturing_Icon] +15% manufacturing to any planet ship is stationed at.

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary17_Name
StringTable.String: Crane

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary17_Dec
StringTable.String: Fleeing his homeworld and rumored charges of war crimes, the mysterious figure known only as Crane refuses to provide any hints of the past he has left behind. Offering his services and vast intellect to the highest bidder, it seems likely he has walked this morally dubious path before.

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary17_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Research_Icon] +5 Research points to any planet ship is stationed at.

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary18_Name
StringTable.String: Annjeanette Sil

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary18_Dec
StringTable.String: Everyone know Annjeanette, though her infamous aloofness means few can claim to know her well. Mistress of every good time known to the civilized galaxy, Annjeanette Sil and her notorious party barge, the Bacchanal, increase the morale (and frequency of debilitating headaches) of every port they drop anchor in.

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary18_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=ApprovalStatIcon] +5 Morale points to any planet ship is stationed at.

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary19_Name
StringTable.String: Friendly Mike

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary19_Dec
StringTable.String: Friendly Mike has a deal for you! He has a deal for everyone, in truth, though interestingly, customer satisfaction with those deals never seems to linger. Bottom line, chum, is that he's better to have on your side than the other way around.

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary19_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Credits_Icon] +5 Credits per turn to any planet ship is stationed at.

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary20_Name
StringTable.String: Silvainout

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary20_Dec
StringTable.String: Silvainout's name is practically a curse in half the galaxy, his tiny little ship nearly impossible to hit. But he's far more than an annoyance; the Raptor's impressive array of weapons make Silvainout a valuable component of any potential task force.

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary20_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Military_Power_Icon] +75% Evasion [ICON=KineticRangeIcon] High mass driver attack

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary21_Name
StringTable.String: Qualen Dohg

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary21_Dec
StringTable.String: Hailing from a world with an incredibly uneven distribution of resources, Qualen Dohg's clan has long experience defending its wealth from the barbarians outside their gates. Taking this expertise to the stars has served Qualen well, and his fetishistic urge for defensive improvements has resulted in an incredibly resilient little warship.

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary21_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Hitpoints_Icon] Has the hit points of a medium ship

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary22_Name
StringTable.String: Prince Viturian

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary22_Dec
StringTable.String: Sixty-eighth in line for the throne that bears his name, Prince Viturian saw that his fortune would never be made at home. Taking what wealth he had to the stars, he procured a warship equipped with the latest in beam technology, to help him find glory, taking it by force if necessary.

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary22_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=BeamRangeIcon] +50% Beam Range [ICON=ShieldStrengthIcon] Ignores 75% of Beam Damage.

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary23_Name
StringTable.String: Zeek the Meek

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary23_Dec
StringTable.String: Angry and eager to show it, Zeek the Meek has spent his whole life railing against the galaxy which sarcastically gave him his nickname. His ship, the Bludgeon, is as belligerent as he is, with a curious defensive system that makes it well suited for the bloodiest of battles.

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary23_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Special_Icon] Ignores 30% of all damage taken [ICON=BeamAugmentIcon] Powerful prototype beam weapon

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary24_Name
StringTable.String: Tad Stormbringer

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary24_Dec
StringTable.String: Born Tad Piddleworth, heir to the Piddleworth fortune, Tad ran away from his life of leisure to seek a more visceral life as a mercenary. After adopting a new name - which most agree is trying a little hard - Tad Stormbringer has managed to transform himself into a surprisingly effective mercenary with a flair for the use of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary24_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=MissileAugmentIcon] Powerful Prototype missiles. [ICON=Stat_Handy_Icon] Repairs Instantly at end of battle

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary25_Name
StringTable.String: Lain

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary25_Dec
StringTable.String: Lain is the senior most member of an order of warrior monks. Their intensive physical training has rendered their bodies incredibly effective at adapting to the rigors of space travel, increasing the effectiveness and range of their life support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary25_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=BeamAugmentIcon] Powerful prototype Beam weapons [ICON=Shiprange_Icon] Long Range [ICON=Moves_Icon] Prototype hyper drive.

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary26_Name
StringTable.String: Ser Manx of Kaul

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary26_Dec
StringTable.String: An expert in every aspect of naval warfare, Ser Manx of Kaul has seen starships explode in every way imaginable. Approaching retirement, he now favors support roles, his ship, the Elembrial, suiting this role perfectly with its modules capable of improving the beam effectiveness of an entire fleet.

StringTable.Label: Tier1Mercenary26_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=BeamAugmentIcon] +50% to its Beam Attack, as well as all ships in its fleet. [ICON=Stat_Planetary_Defense_Icon] High defenses and Hit Points.

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary01_Name
StringTable.String: Reef Farseer

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary01_Dec
StringTable.String: Few people have even heard of Reef Farseer, so effective at surveying that he's rarely available to take on a job. Back in civilized space for a limited time, and already itching for a new mission, this is an opportunity not to be missed.

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary01_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=CanSurveyIcon] Survey Ship [ICON=Shiprange_Icon] Long Range [ICON=Moves_Icon] Fast

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary04_Name
StringTable.String: Yshua of Antarzea

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary04_Dec
StringTable.String: Soft spoken, yet with a voice that carries far, Yshua of Antarzea has already attracted a number of followers who flock to hear his voice. Fair-minded rulers and despots alike would do well to invite him and his constructor ship to settle in their territory, to make his followers their own.

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary04_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=StarbaseSupport] Instant 100 Influence points when constructed. [ICON=InfluenceGrowth_Icon] 100% Influence per turn thereafter.

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary05_Name
StringTable.String: Fitrios Pompados

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary05_Dec
StringTable.String: The famed Fitrios Pompados has pulled off some of the greatest deals and most notorious swindles the galaxy has ever seen. A born survivor, even when his schemes and ploys fall apart, he and his ship, the Trireme, always seem to emerge unscathed.

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary05_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Credits_Icon] Builds trade route with double normal yields. [ICON=Stat_Special_Icon] Re-Spawns on home world if broken.

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary06_Name
StringTable.String: Dr. Jondi Ians

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary06_Dec
StringTable.String: A professor of Precursor archaeology, Dr. Jondi Ians neglects his classroom work so much in preference for fieldwork, he's in serious danger of losing his tenure. His ship, the Coronado, is uniquely well equipped for the analysis of Precursor relics and Ascension gates.

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary06_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=AscensionPointsStatIcon] Station at a Starbase to doubles the bonus given by Precursor Studies.

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary07_Name
StringTable.String: Inquisitor

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary07_Dec
StringTable.String: Without saying a word, aliens of every species fall to pieces in Inquisitor's presence, willing giving up whatever secrets they hold dearest. No-one dares ask how Inquisitor manages this. No-one likes being around him much at all. But boy, does he sure get the rabble in line.

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary07_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=ApprovalStatIcon] +100% Approval to any planet ship is stationed at.

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary08_Name
StringTable.String: Kalli Datun

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary08_Dec
StringTable.String: Hailing from a grossly overpopulated world, like most of her kind, Kalli Datun grew up to be an expert on efficiency. Finding the galaxy filled with people far more wasteful, she now sells her expertise to those who can afford it, increasing the economic output of any world she's stationed at.

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary08_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Credits_Icon] +5 Credits per turn any planet ship is stationed at.

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary09_Name
StringTable.String: Melkiur Savante

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary09_Dec
StringTable.String: Fleeing a world where the intelligent are fed to the carnivorous plants which rule it, Melkiur Savante talks little about his past, though some whisper rumors that he lost a loved one during his escape. He's found some degree of peace selling his services to those who promise not to feed him to carnivorous plants.

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary09_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Research_Icon] +5 Research points to any planet ship is stationed at.

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary10_Name
StringTable.String: Ghhhhhsk

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary10_Dec
StringTable.String: Ghhhhhhsk is so cool. Everyone knows it, and everyone wants to be around him. Anyone who is around Ghhhhhhsk is made cooler by his presence, though forever fears the day he'll decide to leave.

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary10_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=InfluenceGrowth_Icon] +100% influence per turn of any planet ship is stationed at.

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary11_Name
StringTable.String: Master of Tongues

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary11_Dec
StringTable.String: Master of Tongues offers a simple service. He will teach you how to speak. Not using the words you know. Better words. Words that people hear. He will do this for a fee, and that fee will be repaid to you a hundred-fold. You would be foolish not to do this. So. Are you a fool?

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary11_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=InfluenceGrowth_Icon] +150 Points to the base influence of any colony while ship is stationed there.

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary12_Name
StringTable.String: LL-88

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary12_Dec
StringTable.String: LL-88 is a merciless assassin bot, renowned for the brutal methods it uses in combat. Rumored to have killed the inventor who made it, along with a pretty serious percentage of the people who hire it, LL-88 is only hired by the truly desperate.

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary12_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Malevolent_Icon] +5 Malevolent Ideology points each time ship, or fleet it is in, wins a battle.

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary13_Name
StringTable.String: The Lash of Kypriat

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary13_Dec
StringTable.String: The right hand of the tyrant Queen Kypriat, the Lash was sent away by her mistress on a secret mission, only to return to find her queen murdered, and home destroyed. The Lash fled to the stars, taking on mercenary work to equip her ship with the weapons she would need to one day take her revenge.

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary13_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=BeamRangeIcon] +50% Beam Range [ICON=BeamAccuracyIcon] +50% Beam Accuracy [ICON=Stat_Military_Power_Icon] +50% Evasion

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary14_Name
StringTable.String: Basilisk

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary14_Dec
StringTable.String: Regarded to be one of the most dangerous killers in the galaxy, the being known only as Basilisk claims to have the blood of every sentient species on his hands. Few believe that likely, though none have questioned it to his face.

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary14_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=KineticAugmentIcon] Prototype Mass drivers [ICON=Moves_Icon] Fast [ICON=Shiprange_Icon] Extremely long range

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary15_Name
StringTable.String: Spinn

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary15_Dec
StringTable.String: Born a cripple, Spinn lacked many of the limbs his species required for basic social acceptance. A recluse, he devoted his efforts to his twin passions: the manipulation of drones, and feeling bitter. Two skills which have proven remarkably handy in the mercenary world he now finds himself.

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary15_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=FightersCap_Icon] Carries 5 Interceptor drones

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary16_Name
StringTable.String: Admiral Waro

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary16_Dec
StringTable.String: The Pursuit, personal flagship of Admiral Waro of Wutte, was the only element of the Wuttinese fleet to survive the Battle of Repeculae III. A disgrace to their people, Waro and his crew fled Wuttinese space to eke out a living performing mercenary work.

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary16_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=MissileAugmentIcon] Powerful Prototype Missile weapons

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary17_Name
StringTable.String: The Night Fist

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary17_Dec
StringTable.String: One of the most famous pirates in the galaxy, the Night Fist has recently decided to reject the life of an outlaw and enter almost-respectable world of mercenary work. Why this famous rogue would reject freedom is unknown, though some whisper he has found love.

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary17_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=BeamAugmentIcon] Powerful prototype beam weapons

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary18_Name
StringTable.String: Watterson Bitte

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary18_Dec
StringTable.String: Whether he invented or merely stole the vessel which bears his name, Watterson Bitte refuses to say. What needs no explanation is its popularity in the mercenary market, thanks to its ability to extend hyperwarp bubbles around an entire fleet.

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary18_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Moves_Icon] +50% to the moves of all ships in fleet

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary19_Name
StringTable.String: Kreuger von Trant

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary19_Dec
StringTable.String: Born to wealth and prone to idleness, Kreuger von Trant has recently decided to lark around a bit as a mercenary. Able to coax out of his parents a ship with massive shields, he also had it fitted with a prototype shield projector to boost his popularity amongst with his new friends.

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary19_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=ShieldStrengthIcon] All ships in fleet receive a free 10 points of shields defense

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary20_Name
StringTable.String: Holopai

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary20_Dec
StringTable.String: Many people wonder if Holopai is part computer, thanks to his unusual manner of speaking and also the wires trailing out the back of his head. What is certain is the effectiveness of his ship's targeting computers, and the resulting combat efficiency of any fleet Holopai travels with.

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary20_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=AllWeaponsIcon] +30% range to all weapons in fleet [ICON=AllWeaponsIcon] +30% rate of fire to all weapons in fleet.

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary21_Name
StringTable.String: Strafford Leet

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary21_Dec
StringTable.String: A biomachinima that contains the embedded souls of three computer experts, Strafford Leet is a monstrosity. His/Her/Their ship, the Gestalt, has notoriously effective evasive and targeting modules, and is capable of enhancing an entire fleet's combat effectiveness.

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary21_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=BeamAugmentIcon] +30% Evasion to all ships in fleet [ICON=BeamAugmentIcon] +30% Accuracy to all weapons in fleet.

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary22_Name
StringTable.String: Ban Seurt of Illia

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary22_Dec
StringTable.String: A dozen years ago, the colony of Illia was annihilated from space by a mass driver equipped mercenary fleet. Vowing revenge, Ban Seurt fitted a ship with a prototype inertial dampening field, then went undercover in the mercenary world to hunt down the villains.

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary22_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=KineticAttackIcon] All ships in fleet ignore 75% of all mass driver damage.

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary23_Name
StringTable.String: Yiyiz Ziyiy

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary23_Dec
StringTable.String: If civilians knew how much their leaders were spending on guns, they wouldn't be leaders for much longer. The weapons contractor Yiyiz Ziyiy has a solution to this problem. He keeps very, very poor records. This makes him very popular amongst the politicians who hire him.

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary23_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=StatTooltipBreakdown_Military_Icon] +100% to military production to any planet ship is stationed at.

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary24_Name
StringTable.String: Evelon Masha

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary24_Dec
StringTable.String: It's hard to tell if you're talking to the real Evelon Masha. A master of disguise, and known to use decoys, body doubles, and drones in her place, Masha's caution has made her an unusual figure in a mercenary world known more for brash aggressiveness. Though a popular one, as her ship, the Scow, can salvage debris from battle.

StringTable.Label: Tier2Mercenary24_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Credits_Icon] +50% fleet evasion and salvages 250 Credits each time it survives a battle.

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary01_Name
StringTable.String: Laqt Reecher

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary01_Dec
StringTable.String: Laqt Reecher is less of a mercenary as much as he is a freelance administrator. Capable of earning a person's loyalty with the slightest gesture, everyone around him suddenly decides they want to work much, much harder. When stationed on a starbase, his effect is not hard to notice.

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary01_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=AreaofEffectIcon] +100% to the Area of Effect of any starbase that the ship is stationed at.

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary02_Name
StringTable.String: The Last Boyar

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary02_Dec
StringTable.String: His entire race destroyed in a war long ago, the Last Boyar carries with him an incredible ability: the ability to breathe life into a dead world. But with no other Boyar left to populate it, this ability is as much a curse as a gift, and he has vowed to donate his service to the highest bidder, using the funds to establish a memorial for his kind.

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary02_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=CanColonizeIcon] Turn any one dead planet into a Class 16 Habitable planet.

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary03_Name
StringTable.String: ruire podaq nu

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary03_Dec
StringTable.String: A quiet figure, ruire podaq nu tells an interesting story. She has discovered a powerful Precursor constructor ship that can sway the minds of beings across vast distances. And she's willing to let you use it. The cost, of course, is astronomical, and no-one has taken her up on it yet. But the potential payoff is massive...

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary03_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=AreaofEffectIcon] Instantly Flips any non capital planet in Area of Effect.

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary04_Name
StringTable.String: Dak-Tat-Sum

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary04_Dec
StringTable.String: Dak-Tat-Sum claims to represent the sentient factory ship Apex, though no-one is quite sure of the true nature of their relationship. Apex apparently wants to earn money, and is willing to work for it. The ship's abilities are unsurpassed, though for now few customers have trusted the pair enough to say yes.

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary04_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Manufacturing_Icon] +25% manufacturing to any planet ship is stationed at.

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary05_Name
StringTable.String: Mancel Slader

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary05_Dec
StringTable.String: Mancel Slader claims to have found a Precursor artifact which allows him to travel a short distance into the future. Whether this is true or not is open to debate, but what isn't is the unusual devices that he regularly emerges with from the bowels of his ship, the Sidrat. His presence could dramatically boost the effectiveness of a planet's research operations.

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary05_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Research_Icon] +25% Research to any planet ship is stationed at.

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary06_Name
StringTable.String: The Elector of Bellum

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary06_Dec
StringTable.String: The Elector of Bellum knows how to get things done. The latest in a long line of gifted politicians, a few calm words from her can make almost any parties come to a mutually beneficial agreement. Or at least an agreement that benefits her.

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary06_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Credits_Icon] +25% Credits per turn to any planet ship is stationed at.

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary07_Name
StringTable.String: LK Seeth

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary07_Dec
StringTable.String: Equipped with powerful production modules that use ancient Precursor nanotechnology, the ship Straisor and it's captain, LK Seeth, are a hot commodity in parts of the galaxy which need more, now, no questions asked.

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary07_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Raw_Productive_Icon] +10% Raw Production to any planet ship is stationed at.

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary08_Name
StringTable.String: Arch Seinegrave

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary08_Dec
StringTable.String: Arch Seinegrave doesn't need any weapons other than a quiet conversation. Owed favors around the galaxy, the simple arrival of his ship in a system can cause tremendous waves in the society below, as politicians, business people and other social climbers jockey for position.

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary08_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=InfluenceGrowth_Icon] +250 Points to the base influence and +100% influence per turn of any planet ship is stationed at.

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary09_Name
StringTable.String: Flock-Leader Jat

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary09_Dec
StringTable.String: Jat is the nominal leader of a tribe of mercenaries who outfitted themselves with symbiotic network links. Along with making them incredibly effective fighter pilots, this procedure also means they get along fairly well, enabling Flock-Leader Jat to cram more of them on board their carrier, the Linked Aerie.

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary09_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=FightersCap_Icon] 4 Assault drones [ICON=FightersCap_Icon] 4 Escort drones [ICON=FightersCap_Icon] 5 Assault Fighters

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary10_Name
StringTable.String: Lisette de Urt

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary10_Dec
StringTable.String: A warlord from the battle strewn Centaurus arm, Lisette de Urt has seen billions of souls extinguished in her life, and been the cause of well over half of them. Her battleship, the Excruciator, is well balanced and equipped with powerful offensive and defensive systems.

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary10_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=KineticAugmentIcon] Powerful prototype Mass drivers [ICON=Stat_Planetary_Defense_Icon] High defenses of all types

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary11_Name
StringTable.String: Url Stratego

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary11_Dec
StringTable.String: Captured by pirates as a child, Url Stratego has spent his whole life in the underworld, rising up within their ranks to become one of the most feared mercenaries in the galaxy. Intimately familiar with how lean the mercenary life can be, his ship, the Fissure, is amazingly efficient and requires only the bare minimum of logistical support.

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary11_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=BeamAugmentIcon] Powerful Beam Weapons [ICON=ShipLogistics_Icon] Only takes up 2 Logistics points.

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary12_Name
StringTable.String: Raz Pleetson

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary12_Dec
StringTable.String: Raz Pleetson is the spokesperson for the socialist collective known as the Accord. Surprisingly effective mercenaries, they share all profits from the activities equally and without conflict. Their vessel, the Sickle, is renowned for its rapid strike capability.

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary12_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=MissileAugmentIcon] Powerful missile weapons [ICON=Shiprange_Icon] Long Range [ICON=Moves_Icon] Fast

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary13_Name
StringTable.String: Poelacca

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary13_Dec
StringTable.String: The Collective is a ship crewed entirely by clones of a being known as Poelacca. No-one knows which of them is the original Poelacca, or even if he's still alive. They consider it kind of rude to ask. Questions about their origination don't seem to limit their effectiveness though, their ship being notoriously dangerous in all forms of combat.

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary13_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=AllWeaponsIcon] Powerful weapons of all kinds

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary14_Name
StringTable.String: XRT80-DEF

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary14_Dec
StringTable.String: XRT80-DEF is the avatar for the powerful computer inside Helmder, a gigantic carrier. Staffed entirely by biological crew, none of whom will explain why they unflinchingly follow the orders of an AI, Helmder is an oddity in the galaxy, though an enormously dangerous one, capable of fielding a huge fleet of fighters, and the evasive modules to cover their attacks.

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary14_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=FightersCap_Icon] 6 Escort drones [ICON=FightersCap_Icon] 10 Assault Fighters [ICON=JammingIcon] 50% Evasion to all ships in fleet

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary15_Name
StringTable.String: Enopriumta Xu

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary15_Dec
StringTable.String: The merciless leader of the vessel Shaout, Enopriumta Xu has taken hostage the immediate family of every member of his crew, to ensure their complete loyalty. The long term effectiveness of this motivational technique aside, the Shaout is a brutally capable Dreadnought, with balanced offsensive and defensive powers.

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary15_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=KineticAugmentIcon] Powerful Mass Drivers [ICON=KineticRangeIcon] +100% mass driver range

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary16_Name
StringTable.String: The Elder Kriat

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary16_Dec
StringTable.String: Elder of an order of religious ascetics, Kriat commands the all-female crew of the Hermitage. Refusing to discuss the details of their religion with unclean outsiders, the most notable feature of their faith seems to be their willingness to kill in exchange for money. Also relevant: they are very, very good at it.

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary16_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=BeamAugmentIcon] Powerful Beam Weapons [ICON=BeamAugmentIcon] Ignores 75% of Beam Damage

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary17_Name
StringTable.String: Father Lesman

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary17_Dec
StringTable.String: Father Lesman is a famous figure in the underworld, tending to children who have lost their families in this conflict strewn galaxy. He doesn't do this for completely altruistic purposes it must be said, using his flock to tend the fleet shield generator of his ship, the Willow. Working as mercenaries, if they can't end war, they can at least try to prevent more children growing up parentless.

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary17_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Planetary_Defense_Icon] +50% to all of the defenses in its Fleet [ICON=JammingIcon] 75% Dodge [ICON=BeamAugmentIcon] Fast

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary18_Name
StringTable.String: Hon Malteuse

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary18_Dec
StringTable.String: A prolific inventor, Hon Malteuse was unable to find a buyer for his latest invention, the warship Cixma. Vowing to show the galaxy its effectiveness himself, he now offers his services on the open market until he can secure the long term weapons contract he desires.

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary18_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=AllWeaponsIcon] Powerful Prototype Weapons [ICON=Shiprange_Icon] Long Range [ICON=Moves_Icon] Fast

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary19_Name
StringTable.String: Kelpie Wittque

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary19_Dec
StringTable.String: Where others see boredom, Kelpie Wittque sees opportunity. In a market filled with pointy toothed killers, she saw the profit potential in fleet support. Her ship, the Caravan, is equipped with powerful hyperfield boosting systems, that can speed up and extend the range of every ship in her fleet.

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary19_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Moves_Icon] +50% Moves to all ships in fleet [ICON=Shiprange_Icon] Entire Fleet is given 350 tile Range

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary20_Name
StringTable.String: Brootus

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary20_Dec
StringTable.String: Brootus isn't smart. So no-one's quite sure how he was able to obtain an omni-defense field projection module. Violence seems likely. However it happened, by knocking this module into his ship, the Derr, he's made himself a very valuable asset, increasing the survivability of every ship in his fleet.

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary20_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Planetary_Defense_Icon] +10 to all of the defenses in its fleet [ICON=Stat_Special_Icon] Ignores 75% of all damage

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary21_Name
StringTable.String: Shade

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary21_Dec
StringTable.String: The mysterious figure known as Shade has a vessel of completely unknown design, equipped with prototype weapons and damage repair systems. Known as the Wraith, and likely stolen from a weapons lab somewhere, Shade uses it to assist his work as a mercenary, while constantly on the run from its rightful owners.

StringTable.Label: Tier3Mercenary21_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Ship_Maintenance_Icon] Powerful Mass Drivers [ICON=Stat_Ship_Maintenance_Icon] Increases strategic and tactical repair for entire fleet.
